Text: Free Trial plus new economic reports calendarHpst Dear Trader View the new economic reports calendar at calendarhtm Test before you invest Receive your FREE issue trial to the oldest daily futures trading system published in the world See COMMODEX in action in real markets COMMODEX tracks all active US futures and contract months Unique formula correlates price volume and open interest changes to produce exact buy and sell technical signals For your free trial go to infohtm Good trading Equidex Brokerage Group Inc This letter is intended as informational only It is not intended to annoy or aggravate you in any way If you are offended by this type of email message reply to this letter and type remove on the subject line and Ill gladly take you off my list The risk of loss in trading futures options cash currencies and other leveraged transaction products can be substantial Therefor only risk capital should be used Futures options cash currencies and other leveraged transaction products are not suitable investments for everyone Consider your financial condition before deciding to invest or trade or invest
